remarks: Identity of Betweenness.  Axiom A6 of [Schwabhauser] p. 11. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
statement:
axtrkg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
axtrkg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
axtrkg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
axtrkg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
axtgbtwnid.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
axtgbtwnid.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
axtgbtwnid.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( X I X ) ) $.
axtgbtwnid $p |- ( ph -> X = Y ) $.
